name: Valley Defender
description:
Platform: Windows
Build: Unity3D

A simple 3D Tower Defense game developed for Windows. This project was made while I studying in the Game Development & Project Management Program at Sripatum University. Visit one of my teammate's pages at @Waranya.itch.io

In the game, the player takes on the role of a hero who comes to save the village in the valley from monsters. Manage your resources and build towers to defeat the incoming waves by killing all enemies before they can reach the village gate. Think of a strategy and face off against the merciless monsters.

GAMEPLAY

The player will have limited resources in the beginning so be aware of that because you can't build a tower if you don't have enough required resources. You get additional resources each time you kill a monster. But some resources are random to get so come up with a good plan before you build a tower.

In addition, the player also has two magic skills that required no resources. But still has quite a long cooldown time so it should be used when necessary.

FEATURES Kill enemies and earn resources Build various towers Three different Maps Two magic skills  Three enemy types SPECIAL THANKS

Defense tower models from @free-game-assets.itch.io

NOTE

This project is one of my personal projects to practice and improve my game development skills. This project is not intended for commercial purposes.
